name: DungeonFrenzy
0:
”Alexa, open Dungeon Frenzy”
”Alexa, talk to Dungeon Frenzy”
”Alexa, let's play Dungeon Frenzy”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: dungeon frenzy
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Dungeon Frenzy is a fast paced rogue-like RPG built for smart speakers.
No two games are alike. The dungeons and monster encounters are randomly generated.
To gain experience points, you need to kill monsters.
To regain health points, you need to find food or healing potions while looting treasure chests.
Better armor and weapons are automatically equipped when looted.
Increase your maximum health each time you level up!
How long can YOU survive?

HOW TO USE:
Get started by saying "Alexa, enable Dungeon Frenzy."
Then, just chose what directions to take, when to loot, and whether you will fight or run away from monsters!
Just say "STATS" at any time to hear the state of your health, what weapons and armor you have equipped, and how much experience and gold you have gained.
Say say "HELP" at any time to get tips on how to play.
You can say "STOP" to quit your game and resume it later or "RESTART" to begin the adventure again.
Save up 10 gold for resurrection with the village cleric after death!

FEEDBACK AND SUPPORT:
If you enjoyed Dungeon Frenzy, please leave us a review telling us what you love, what you want to see next, and how we can make Dungeon Frenzy better!
Email me at max@volleythat.com if you have any issues, feedback, or suggestions. I'd love to hear from you!

LEARN MORE:
Created by Volley - the makers of the hit Alexa games Song Quiz, Yes Sire, Popcorn Tycoon, and Bedtime Stories.
https://volleythat.com
